chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> exists (s' : state) (p' : prec_list) (b' : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ MapGet prec_list s' c = Some p' /\ p = upl_conv_1 p' /\ s = umpl_conv_1 s' /\ b = uad_conv_1 b' /\ prec_occur p' b'

Premises:
upl_conv_1 = fix upl_conv_1 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_1 a) (upl_conv_1 p0) (upl_conv_1 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
udta_conv_1 = fun d : preDTA => M2 state (M0 state) (udta_conv_1_aux d) : preDTA -> preDTA
ad = N : Set
state = Map prec_list : Set
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
preDTA = Map state : Set
umpl_conv_1 = fix umpl_conv_1 (s : state) : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list a (upl_conv_1 p) | @M2 _ p0 p1 => M2 prec_list (umpl_conv_1 p0) (umpl_conv_1 p1) end : state -> state
uad_conv_1 = fun a : ad => match a with | 0%N => 1%N | N.pos p => N.pos p~1 end : ad -> ad
udta_conv_0_ref_ok_invar_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> prec_occur p b -> exists (s' : state) (p' : prec_list) (b' : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ MapGet prec_list s' c = Some p' /\ p = upl_conv_0 p' /\ s = umpl_conv_0 s' /\ b = uad_conv_0 b' /\ prec_occur p' b'
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
upl_conv_1_ref_ok_invar : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_1 p) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b /\ prec_occur p b
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
upl_conv_0_ref_ok_invar : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 p) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b /\ prec_occur p b
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
u_conv_1_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_1 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
u_conv_0_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
u_conv_1_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_1 d) (uad_conv_1 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_1 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
upl_conv_1_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_1 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_1 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_1 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_1 ls0
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
upl_conv_0_img_0 : forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), upl_conv_0 p = prec_cons a la ls -> exists (a0 : ad) (la0 ls0 : prec_list), p = prec_cons a0 la0 ls0 /\ a = uad_conv_0 a0 /\ la = upl_conv_0 la0 /\ ls = upl_conv_0 ls0
u_conv_0_invar_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (ladj : state), MapGet state (udta_conv_0 d) (uad_conv_0 a) = Some ladj -> exists ladj0 : state, ladj = umpl_conv_0 ladj0 /\ MapGet state d a = Some ladj0
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
u_conv_1_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_1 p0
upl_conv_1_occur_in_img : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_1 pl) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_1 b
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_1_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p)
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
u_conv_1_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some (upl_conv_1 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p

```coq
intros d a s c p b H1 H2 H3.
assert (H4: exists s' : state, MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ exists p' : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s' c = Some p' /\ p = upl_conv_1 p' /\ s = umpl_conv_1 s').
apply udta_conv_0_ref_ok_invar_0 with (d:=d) (a:=a) (s:=s) (c:=c) (p:=p) (b:=b); auto.
destruct H4 as [s' [H5 [p' [H6 [H7 [H8 H9]]]]]].
exists s', p', uad_conv_1 b.
split; auto.
split; auto.
apply upl_conv_1_ref_ok_invar with (p:=p) (a:=b); auto.
Qed.```

original: intros d a s c p b H1 H2 H3. assert (H4: exists s' : state, MapGet state d a = Some s' /\ exists p' : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s' c = Some p' /\ p = upl_conv_1 p' /\ s = umpl_conv_1 s'). apply udta_conv_0_ref_ok_invar_0 with (d:=d) (a:=a) (s:=s) (c:=c) (p:=p) (b:=b); auto. destruct H4 as [s' [H5 [p' [H6 [H7 [H8 H9]]]]]]. exists s', p', uad_conv_1 b. split; auto. split; auto. apply upl_conv_1_ref_ok_invar with (p:=p) (a:=b); auto.
